name: Unison (Jibrix01)
description:
Unison.

Play as an orb and its clones infinitely wandering through its creator's playground.

Controls:

WASD - up/left/down/right

t - blink (blue - yellow)

y - blink (yellow - blue)

Made in roughly one day. Will be adding a leaderboard soon.

KNOWN BUGS:

some animated backgrounds will not be shown, this will be fixed in a future update.
